short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Extensão para notificar qual música/vídeo está tocando no Deezer, YouTube, Spotify, Google Play Música ou YouTube Music.
short.en: Extension to notify what song/video is playing on Deezer, YouTube, Spotify, Google Play Music or YouTube Music.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: obs.: Recomendado o uso com "Key Socket Media Keys" (https://goo.gl/XCIzG4)
long.en: obs.: Recommended use with "Key Socket Media Keys" (https://goo.gl/XCIzG4)
